attributes.action: Stop the remain voters from the finding a way to overturn the will of the people
attributes.additional_details: The most democratic process this country has seen in a very long time has just taken place, THE PEOPLE HAVE SPOKEN. unfortunately this does not suit some people and they seem to think that it is ok to try to find someway of changing the result or force a second vote. Some of us voted to leave the EU as it is an undemocratic un-elected bureaucracy if the vote to leave is overturned it will be the death knEll for democracy in the UK
attributes.background: The remain voters in the EU referendum are killing democracy by trying various ways of reversing the decision the people have made in the recent democratic process that was the EU referendum
